name: Chaos Dungeon (brainstormerjr)
description:
GAME SUMMARY

Chaos Dungeon is an exciting dungeon crawler game, but without the procedural genearation and with a whole lot of chaos. Choose between two boss fights to get through to the portal! Bullets fired by both you and the enemy bounce off walls and damage everyone, meaning that the bosses can damage themselves, and you can damage yourself.

To survive the chaos, you are equipped with 2 abilities other than shooting: dodge rolling and shielding. Dodge rolling will help you dodge bullets, while shielding with destroy ALL bullets in the area, but has a long cooldown.

CONTROLS
  • WASD to move
  • Left click to shoot
  • Right click to dodge roll
  • Space bar to shield bullets
GAME CREATION
  • All art assets are  hand- drawn frame-by-frame in Procreate
  • Sound effects are generated with BFXR
  • Background music from Youtube Made with Unity
  • Made in 7 days for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2
  • Inspired by Enter the Gungeon
